author: Brian Chapman
text:
For those of you that have an employer sponsored health clinic for your employees, what employee engagement activities did you utilize to gain employee insight, buy in or support? Did you use employee focus groups or an interest survey? If so, could you please send me a copy of the survey or questions used in the focus group.
Thanks.
title: Employer Sponsored Health Clinic Employee Interest Survey
